nodes.text: The Mission to Norval II took place during the Clone Wars, with the objective of capturing Padmé Amidala.

A group of Mandalorian Protectors led by Alpha-Ø2, along with their BL series droid counterparts, were put in charge of the operation, but were set up by Palpatine and ambushed by Galactic Republic forces. All but three Mandalorians were killed. Fenn Shysa, Tobbi Dala, and Mandalore Alpha-Ø2 were the only survivors of this encounter, although the destruction and loss of life left Alpha-Ø2 mentally destroyed. Nonetheless, the battle could be considered as one won by Mandalorians.
